name: Vishnusahasranamam(APLEnabled)

”Alexa, start Vishnu Sahasranamam”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vishnu sahasranamam
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Why Vishnu Sahasranāma?
The epic Sanskrit hymn Vishnu Sahasranāma is a great soul healer. The Vishnu Sahasranāma was written by Mahabharata’s author, sant Vyasa. The sacred text is one of the important pillars of Vaishnavism which has 107 verse and chanted by devotees of Lord Vishnu for ages. The Vishnu Sahasranāma skill recites 1,000 names of Lord Vishnu. Each name of lord Vishnu depicts his countless great attributes. Playing the chant purifies the aura and spreads positivity. The Vishnu Sahasranāma skill lets you feel spiritually enriched and connected with almighty.

Who Can Play?
There is no bar of age, anyone can play it.

How does it work?
It is very easy. Just give a command to launch Vishnu Sahasranamam.

Now you can add this ‘Vishnu Sahasranamam’ Skill to your daily routine list.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
